text: @seanhannity Hannity & Trump downplayed the coronavirus crisis for many weeks, misleading their cultists into a false sense of security. Trump’s partial limit on travel from China was too little, too late. He wasted precious time minimizing the crisis instead of getting PPEs, test kits, etc‼️
